title: All hail the gatekeeper
body: Just gatekept 7 people in silver->gold promos on my gold smurf, AMA

replies.body: For what? Gatekeeping isn't against the rules.
Except gatekeeping on a smurf is technically boosting, only you're boosting your own account and youre not selling it.

> [{quoted}](name=FioraTheExplorer,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=9bAXJT2T,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2015-11-11T04:20:46.343+0000)
>
> Except gatekeeping on a smurf is technically boosting, only you're boosting your own account and youre not selling it.

you're actually retarded.
Ironically, posted on a smurf account, if you want to try and insult me then dont hide behind the anonymity of a forum account you little bitch.

> [{quoted}](name=FioraTheExplorer,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=9bAXJT2T,comment-id=00010000000000010000,timestamp=2015-11-11T06:00:22.055+0000)
>
> Ironically, posted on a smurf account, if you want to try and insult me then dont hide behind the anonymity of a forum account you little bitch.

posted on a smurf cause my main is banned.
you're just proving my point even more.
Smurf or not, it doesn't change the fact you're retarded.

> [{quoted}](name=FioraTheExplorer,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=9bAXJT2T,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2015-11-11T04:20:46.343+0000)
>
> Except gatekeeping on a smurf is technically boosting, only you're boosting your own account and youre not selling it.

That's not how it works at all. Serfige is only eligible for punishment if they gatekept by intentionally throwing games, which is what seems to have been done.

> [{quoted}](name=Serfige,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=9bAXJT2T,comment-id=00010000000000000000,timestamp=2015-11-11T05:15:24.946+0000)
>
> Prove it.

What am I being asked to prove?

gj, rekt them kids


what where the reactions?
Because his life is so bad, he has to make other feel worse. He is the worst kind of league player. I really hope his main gets banned.
